des: "This is a recipe passed down through the generations. I loved these cookies growing up. Now my kids love them. They are very easy and fast to make. If dough gets too thick, add a little more milk."
ins: Combine sugar and milk in a saucepan; bring to a boil, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat; stir in crackers, coconut, and peanut butter until evenly combined. Drop spoonfuls of mixture onto waxed paper. Cool completely.
